thread.title: BRIEF-Regis Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share $0.06 Excluding Items

title: BRIEF-Regis Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share $0.06 Excluding Items
text:
05 AM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Regis Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share $0.06 Excluding Items Reuters Staff 
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Regis Corp: * REGIS REPORTS IMPROVED SECOND QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.83 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q2 REVENUE FELL 2.1 PERCENT TO $308.5 MILLION * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.06 EXCLUDING ITEMS 
* QTRLY DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS $0.83 
* QTRLY CONSOLIDATED SAME-STORE SALES COMPS DOWN 0.7 PERCENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
